mapper.sql: ADDRESS.ID ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS.PARTNER_ID ADDRESS_PARTNERID, ADDRESS.DETAIL ADDRESS_DETAIL, ADDRESS.LAT ADDRESS_LAT, ADDRESS.LNG ADDRESS_LNG, ADDRESS.LAST_MODIFY_TIME ADDRESS_LASTMODIFYTIME, ADDRESS.CREATE_TIME ADDRESS_CREATETIME, ADDRESS.ENABLED ADDRESS_ENABLED, ADDRESS.DELETED ADDRESS_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into ADDRESS
PARTNER_ID,
DETAIL,
LAT,
LNG,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
DELETED,
#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},

mapper.update:
update ADDRESS
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from ADDRESS where DELETED = 0
